DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect three different diet , include diet pistachio , cardiovascular disease risk marker people type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Pistachios Cardiovascular Responses Stress Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study last 12-16 week require 10-13 visit General Clinical Research Center University Park campus . All food snack provide 10 week . At end three diet period , participant undergo test endothelial function , oral glucose tolerance test , cardiovascular stress reactivity test .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking adult , age 3075 year ( woman must postmenopausal ) Diagnosed Type 2 diabetes Insulin , one blood pressure lower medication , daily aspirin , NSAID therapy , oral steroid within last 6 week , oral contraceptive , hormone replacement therapy Chronic disease cardiovascular disease complication diabetes ( retinopathy , neuropathy , etc ) . Allergies aversion pistachio Unwillingness consume food provide meal snack 10 week diet intervention
DOC.keyword: Cardiovascular disease risk factor adults Type II diabetes
